Descripcion: More than 250 species of orchids, ornamental plants, viewpoint for observing hummingbirds, birdwatching trails, butterflies, amphibians and the coffee route.
service1-descripcion: Our garden is home to orchids, heliconia, ferns and other species of plants from our region.
service2-titulo: Guided visits to the hummingbird observatory
service2-descripcion: Enjoy nature and especially our viewpoint for observing hummingbirds.
service3-descripcion: Special dishes, excellent service and the feeling of living an adventure in a tropical environment.
service4-descripcion: Our garden is home to orchids, heliconia, ferns and other species of plants from our region.
service5-titulo: Viewpoint and trails for bird watching
service5-descripcion: Take a tour of our trails ideal for observing birds, butterflies and amphibians.
service6-titulo: Walks in the forest and visit to waterfalls
service6-descripcion: Walk surrounded by an exuberant variety of native flora and fauna with the option of cooling off in the crystal clear waters of the falls.
